Ihe mberede Acerinox bụ ihe mberede radiation na mpaghara Cádiz
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 1998, isi iyi caesium-137 jisiri ike gafee ihe nlekota na ụlọ ọrụ Acerinox scrap metal reprocessing na Los Barrios, Spain
Mgbe ọ gbazere, caesium-137 mere ka a tọhapụ igwe ojii radioactive
Ndị na-achọpụta anwụrụ ọkụ Acerinox enweghị ike ịchọpụta ya, mana emesịrị chọpụta ya na France, Italy, Switzerland, Germany, na Austria
Ọrụ ndị a tụrụ ruru okpukpu 1000 karịa ọkwa ndabere nkịtị, ọ bụ ezie na a ka na-ewere uru zuru oke edere dị ka ihe na-enweghị isi n'ihe gbasara nchebe radiation.
Ihe mberede ahụ butere ụlọ ọrụ a na-esizigharị ígwè, tinyere igwe igwe igwe abụọ ọzọ zipụrụ ihe mkpofu ya maka imetọ ya
Dabere na ụlọ nyocha ndị nọọrọ onwe ha, ntụ nke ụlọ ọrụ Acerinox mepụtara nwere n'etiti 640 na 1420 becquerel kwa gram (usoro Euratom bụ 10 Bq/g), nke zuru oke iji bụrụ ihe iyi ọha egwu eze.
Na nsonaazụ radiological nke ihe omume a, mmadụ isii gosipụtara obere ọkwa nke mmetọ caesium-137
Ọnụ ego a na-eme atụmatụ maka nhicha, nchekwa mkpofu, na mmepụta furu efu na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị ihe dị ka nde dollar US 26 (ọtụtụ n'ime ya n'ihi mmepụta furu furu efu).
